info.title: About Healthy Weight
info.description: Healthy weight is based on the WHO recommended BMI range (18.5-25). This calculator uses your height to determine your healthy weight range and compares multiple scientific formulas to calculate your ideal weight.
info.formulasDescription: Four recognized scientific formulas are included (Robinson 1983, Miller 1983, Devine 1974, Hamwi 1964). The Hamwi formula is also adjusted for small body frame (-10%) and large body frame (+10%).
info.limitations: These formulas are general estimates for adults aged 18 or older. They do not account for individual body composition, muscle mass, or specific health conditions. Consult a healthcare professional for personalized guidance.
